img.br: Franklin City School Board will hold an electronic meeting on Thursday, April 23, 2020.

td.br: Foodbank Food Distribution Sites, Dates and Times Which are Available in the Area Have been Updated.
The Virginia Department of Education has provided two new resources for Parents and Educators.

td.a: WHRO - VA TV Classroom - New Instructional Resource

img.br: It is with Great Excitement that FCPS provides you with additional instructional resources for students that became available from the partnership between the Virginia Department of Education and WHRO Education called the VA TV Classroom.

td.a: Announcement: Pre-K/PreSchool Screenings for 2020-2021 School Year

img.br: Do you have a child that will be 4 years old on or before September 30, 2020 AND lives in the City of Franklin? If so, please call S. P. Morton Elementary School and leave a voicemail for Mrs. Davis to contact you or email her at adavis@fcpsva.org. Click on link above to see flyer.

a.aria-label: Show all articles from News and Announcements

div.p: The Mission of Franklin City Public Schools is to work in partnership with students, families, and the community to provide enriching opportunities to empower individual learners to maximize their potential in becoming critical thinkers, productive citizens and life-long learners.
